name: Flags_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the Flags class.

test_cases.name: testToStringAllFlagsOff
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when all flags are turned off.

test_cases.name: testToStringAllFlagsOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when all flags are turned on.

test_cases.name: testToStringSingleFlagOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when a single flag is turned on.

test_cases.name: testToStringMultipleFlagsOn
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method when multiple flags are turned on.

test_cases.name: testToStringTurnOffFlag
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method after turning off a specific flag.
